Class Callout

java.lang.Object
GraphicObject
Callout
All Implemented Interfaces:
Drawable
public class Callout extends GraphicObject
This class models a Callout object. A Callout is a text bubble that appears over a teddyBear with a specific message and follows the bear's movements

  • Field Summary

    Fields inherited from class GraphicObject

    image, toySaga, x, y

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Callout(int x, int y)
    Constructs a new Callout object positioned at x and y positions within the screen and assigns it a random filename from the filenames array as its image filename using the getRandomFilename() method

  • Method Summary

    Methods inherited from class GraphicObject

    draw, getX, getY, setImage, setProcessing

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Constructor Details

    • Callout

      public Callout(int x, int y)
      Constructs a new Callout object positioned at x and y positions within the screen and assigns it a random filename from the filenames array as its image filename using the getRandomFilename() method
      Parameters:
      x - x-position (horizontal position) of this Callout object
      y - y-position (vertical position) of this Callout object
